response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value for us at $12,000. Considering its worth to you, I propose an offer of $10,000 to make this exceptional opportunity accessible to you. This price reflects a fair balance between the value we place on the product and the benefit it would bring to you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 10000}
